p: üéâ We are thrilled to announce a dynamic partnership between HattyHood and VECTOR NDT & ZCHEM! ü§ù Our exceptional offerings and their innovative technology are coming together to create a powerful synergy. HattyHood‚Äôs commitment to crafting sustainable and bespoke products sustainability aligns seamlessly with VECTOR NDT & ZCHEM's values and offerings. üçÉ üåç

üíº VECTOR NDT & ZCHEM is renowned for its cutting-edge solutions in Magnetic Particle Inspection & Liquid Penetrant Inspection Techniques. Their dedication to quality and excellence is evident through their world-class manufacturing facility.

üöÄBy integrating our sustainable products with their industry-leading solutions, we're not just collaborating; we're brandifying success! and is a testament to our shared commitment to pushing boundaries and delivering exceptional value to clients.üåê
üåü Our shared values of sustainability, innovation, and excellence will undoubtedly create a lasting impact on the industries we serve.

blogs.title: Hattyhood takes pride in collaborating with Selco Foundation in a heartwarming endeavor that's sowing the seeds of a greener future! ü§ù‚ú®

p:
Introducing: The Millet Magic Workshop for Rural Heroes! üç≤
üèû Cultivating Change in Our Villages:
When you step into the world of millets and sustainable solutions, you're nurturing not only your land but also the sustainable legacy of our villages.

üåø Join Us in Sowing Sustainability:
Come, be a part of the Millet Magic Workshop, and harvest knowledge that reaps benefits for generations. Explore Hattyhood's collection of sustainable products that honor rural values and traditions.
Let's empower our villages with the wisdom of millets and the embrace of sustainability. Together, we're turning seeds of change into fields of progress. üí™ üåç

blogs.title: HATTYHOOD Proudly Sponsors "Nexus: Nurturing the Next Generation".

p: We are delighted to announce that HATTYHOOD proudly sponsored the prestigious "NexUS: Nurturing the Next Generation" event, organized by BMSCE IEEE Women in Engineering. The occasion served as an exceptional platform for networking, fostering camaraderie among accomplished women speakers, and engaging in insightful panel discussions.üí´

In our commitment to sustainability‚ôª, we provided the club with an array of thoughtfully curated, eco-friendly products that exemplified our dedication to promoting a circular economyüåø . These customized products played a vital role in enhancing the club‚Äôs unique branding and image. The event stood out, leaving a profound and thought-provoking impression on its attendees.üíö

As we reflect on this remarkable collaboration, HATTYHOOD takes immense pride in contributing to the club's journey. Together, we envision a future where sustainability and innovation unite to shape a better world. üí™üåè

blogs.title: Samskruthi 2023: A Celebration of Girl Power

p: The three-day inter-collegiate fest Samskruthi 2023, organized by BMS College of Commerce and Management, V V Puram, and BMS Evening College of Arts and Commerce, Basavanagudi, Bengaluru from 7th to 9th July 2023. The fest was dedicated to the cause of "Save Girl Child", and featured a variety of events that highlighted the talents and achievements of young talent.
Some of the events that were held at Samskruthi 2023 included:
‚Ä¢ Mock stock: A simulated stock market trading competition that gave students the opportunity to learn about the stock market and how to invest.

‚Ä¢ The Enact: A dumb charades competition that tested the participants' acting skills and creativity. This event was a lot of fun and it showcased the participants' creativity and ability to think on their feet
‚Ä¢ Danspiration: A dance competition that showcased the talents of young women from across the city. This event was a visual feast and it was inspiring to see the participants' passion for dance.
‚Ä¢ 100 Mile: A start-up competition that challenged students to come up with innovative business ideas. This event was a great way to encourage entrepreneurship.
‚Ä¢ Hum and Hunch: A music trivia competition that tested the participants' knowledge of popular songs.

‚Ä¢ Chucklesome: A mad ad competition that challenged students to create humorous commercials. This event was a lot of fun and it was a great way to showcase the participants' creativity and sense of humor.
‚Ä¢ Vogue Alley: A fashion show that featured the latest trends in women's clothing. It was inspiring to see the participants' sense of style.

The fest was also graced by the presence of some prominent artists, including Vidya Balan, Usha Uthup, and ALL OK who also performed at the fest. Their performances were a highlight of the fest and they helped to raise awareness about the importance of girl child education and empowerment.

In addition to the events and performances, Samskruthi 2023 also featured a number of sustainable initiatives. For example, the organizers partnered with Hattyhood to provide sustainable corporate gifting options to dignitaries. Hattyhood supplied 100 bamboo bottles, jute bags, folders, and bamboo pens, which were all made from eco-friendly materials. This initiative helped to promote the importance of sustainability and was appreciated by the guests. It was a great way to reduce the environmental impact of the fest.

Samskruthi 2023 was a successful event that brought together talent from across the city to celebrate their talents and achievements. The fest also raised awareness about the importance of girl child education and empowerment. It was a truly memorable event and it is sure to be remembered for years to come.

blockquote.p: The greatest threat to our planet is the belief that someone else will save it.

p: Hattyhood, a custom merchandise and gifting company that aims to promote sustainable and eco-friendly practices is proud to partner with SJCIT to support the BGS Nandi Run 2023. The run was held by the SJCIT‚Äôs Department of physical education and Sports on July 22nd at 6 AM at their campus in Chickballapur, India.

The BGS Nandi Run is an event that aims to promote environmental awareness and sustainability. This year's run was themed Go Green, Breathe Clean. Participants were encouraged to run or walk the course to spread awareness & protect the environment.

Hattyhood provided the customized jerseys for the run which were printed with the event logo and the message Go Green, Breathe Clean. The t-shirts were a hit with the participants, and they helped to raise awareness about the importance of environmental protection.The total prize money was worth 40,000 INR and was awarded to the top finishers in each category.

Hattyhood is proud to have partnered with SJCIT to support the BGS Nandi Run 2023. The event was a great success and helped raise awareness about the importance of environmental protection. Hattyhood is committed to promoting sustainable and eco-friendly practices, and we are proud to support events like the BGS Nandi Run.

By partnering with SJCIT's BGS Nandi Run 2023, we were able to help raise awareness about the importance of environmental protection and sustainability. We are committed to continuing to support events like this one, and we hope to inspire others to make a difference.
If you are interested in learning more about Hattyhood or our products, please visit our website at www.hattyhood.com.

blogs.title: The required switch to Sustainable Practices in India's Corporate Gifting Industry

p: Corporate giving, for which businesses annually spend billions of dollars, has become a crucial component of Indian corporate culture as a way to express gratitude and foster relationships. According to Forbes, over 80% of gifting in India is expected to be corporate, with the gifting market expected to reach $84 billion by 2024. Corporate purchasing teams must review their procedures, given the industry's substantial reliance on unsustainable machine-printed plastic products, due to the lack of focus on sustainability and green initiatives in this multi-billion dollar market.
1. The UN Sustainable Development Goals suggest corporations need to take action on responsible consumption and production, promoting sustainable practices and reducing waste.
2. These products are not only harmful to the environment but also lack the personal touch that gifting should represent.
3. Sustainability and green initiatives can be prioritized by working with suppliers who offer eco-friendly products and encouraging the use of reusable and recyclable materials.

4. It helps reduce the environmental impact of the practice and also reflects positively on the company's image and values. It can also help build stronger relationships with clients and partners who share the same values and priorities.

5. By making sustainability, circular economy, and green initiatives a mandate in choosing gifts for partners, clients, and employees, corporate purchasing teams can make a positive impact on the environment and economy while also adding a personal touch to every gift, making it more meaningful and memorable.
6. Furthermore, when a company is perceived as taking steps to preserve the planet leads to a positive impact on its brand image and long-term profitability.
What qualifies as a sustainable gift?
‚Ä¢ Gifts made from eco-friendly, recycled, or repurposed materials
‚Ä¢ Items that include locally sourced or organic materials
‚Ä¢ Items with alternative materials or those made from certified sustainable processes
‚Ä¢ Items that can help eliminate single-use plastics
‚Ä¢ Products that have achieved certification for sustainable industry standards
The best sustainable corporate gifts meet the following criteria:
1. Reinforce your company values
2. Reflect on the quality of your relationship
3. Adhere to company policy
4. Are personalized
5. Are artfully presented
6. Are useful

blockquote.p: Sustainable development is the development that meets the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.

blogs.title: Sustainability is no longer about doing less harm, it's about doing more good.

p: Making informed decisions to encourage sustainable living is the first step in being environmentally conscious. It involves forming routines that can aid in resource conservation, carbon footprint reduction, and environmental protection. It's time to say goodbye to disposable, fast corporate gifting and welcome to giving that is socially and environmentally responsible. As companies increasingly recognize the importance of sustainable practices, embracing eco-friendly gifting solutions becomes a natural extension of their commitment to the environment. Corporate giving option that benefits your clients and employees. We offer a wide variety of imaginative solutions that are sustainable and appropriate for all situations and price ranges. Customers and staff may easily lessen their environmental footprint while still getting a fantastic product when you offer sustainable products. Your company's environmental effect is lessened by using our environmentally friendly goods. These products range from drinkware, pencils, and customizable clothing. In the last ten years, there has been a significant movement in B2C giving towards ethical and environmentally friendly goods. Consumers and MNCs are now choosing to give gifts with a purpose.
Why should an organization opt for sustainable gifting options?
1. Express your company's active commitment to sustainability and the future of the earth.
2. Reduce your carbon and waste footprint.
3. Raise morale and increase work satisfaction among employees.
4. Embrace eco-friendly gifting solutions to encourage sustainable living.
5. Lessen their environmental footprint while still getting a fantastic product.
6. Making informed decisions in being environmentally conscious while hitting the brief.

7. It can also be considered a part of CSR activity that involves the assessment on the basis of customers, suppliers, environment, communities, and employees, and using our services will check all of the above boxes.
8. In corporate gifting 40% of waste is generated as items and packaging ends up in landfills.
9. If u wish not to add to the 146 million metric tonnes of waste generated under this category every year.
10. Extend your branding and brand communication.

blockquote.p: Sustainability is no longer about doing less harm, it's about doing more good.
